stripped_text: Whenever you encounter a piece of ice, you may pay 2 credits. If you do, it gains code gate for the remainder of that encounter. Use this ability only once per turn. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2 credits: +4 strength.
